VoiceList.Entry: Barret “Damn! Sure is hot here!”
“But I sure am glad I can get rid of that damn sailor suit.”
“Yo listen up!! Make sure to mingle like regular folks here!”
Aeris “Oh,too bad. I liked Barret's sailor suit. He looked so cute.”
Barret “What'ya mean 'cute'?”
Tifa “Right…well,uh…”
“Barret,why don't you use that sailor suit for pajamas?”
“Right,Cloud?” Yeah,maybe… Concentrate on Sephiroth
Cloud “Remember,this isn't a vacation. We're here after Sephiroth.”
“I'm going on ahead.”
Barret “Hmmph,Cloud. You're the one, who's always hangin' around wastin' time.”
“I'm checkin' this place out!”
Cloud “Ahhh… You look like a bear wearing a marshmallow.”
Barret “The hell's that supposed to mean!? This happens to be more comfortable, so shu'up!”
Red XIII “…puff…puff…”
“Would you kindly hurry? The heat here is drying my nose.”
Yuffie “Yeah,mine,too!!”
Cloud “All right. We'll take a break and then head off.”
“Don't wander too far.”
Barret “I'll wander wherever I damn well want! Who made him the leader?”
Red XIII “It looks like my mane got messed up.”
“I'm going to rest somewhere cool.”
Tifa “I think I'll go swimming.”
Aeris “Sounds good to me!”
Aeris “Hmm? Cloud, are you thinking of anything in particular?”
“Your cool exterior's cracking…”
Aeris “Well then,let's go!”
Aeris “Maybe I should get a tan for a change?”
“Which do you like,Cloud?” I like fair complexions Maybe a healthy tan is nice
Aeris “Got it. I'll remember that.”
Yuffie “Don't bother looking for me!”
“Geez what a long boat ride!!”
Rufus “Hmmm… Good work everyone…”
Heidegger “Gya,haa,haa!! Hurry up with that!”
“Yes,sir!!”
Rufus “I heard Sephiroth was on board.”
Heidegger “…Yes.”
Rufus “And it seems Cloud and the others were on board,too.”
Heidegger “…Yes.”
Rufus “They all slipped through… You messed up big this time,Heidegger.”
Heidegger “I'm ashamed of myself.”
Rufus “Is that all you can do?”
“Give one word answers and apologize for everything?”
Rufus “Do something. I'll be expecting results.”
“Ready for departure,sir!!”
Rufus “Very well then. That was fast.”
“YES,SIR!! Thank you,sir.”
Rufus “Remember Heidegger, Only one more mistake.”
“I'm the boss!”
“You'll never know what it's like to toil away on the ship.”
“Sailing over the blue sea, gazing up at a sky that seems to drift on forever. Feels like you're taking a nap on birds wings.”
“It's the ultimate high!”
“Handsome…isn't he?”
“Don't worry,I'm not talking about you.”
“I'm talking about President Rufus. Charming,rich,blond… He even looks good in a suit.”
“Heh,heh… I hear the Shinra brass are arriving soon.”
“Heh,heh…! Got nothing to do with us,does it?”
“Hey! Spread out,all of you,out!!”
“Any of you put a scratch or a dent in that plane and I'll put one in your head!”
“Da plane,da plane!! Here's something you'll probably never get to do in your lifetime.”
“So let's just watch from here… and wish.”
“Costa del Sol…a harbor paradise where the sun always shines and it's summer all year round!”
“Hmm…Things aren't going well… You can go sightseeing in the city.”
“Stowaways,right?”
“It's okay. I'm used to them.”
“The truth is,before I worked here, I was one of the best.”
“Don't bug me. This is Rufus's first official visit since becoming President.”
“It seems like he's here on business this time.”
“I'm so jealous of him,I could spit. We're both about the same age, but,he's President.”
“Oh crap… The Shinra Manager won't come down.”
“Even though the President's here on business. All he does is play, forgetting everything to do with work.”
“Rufus complimented me on my job!”
“Wow!! I guess it pays to do good work.”
“Damn. I'm soaked down to my underwear.”
“Oops! You must be those AVALANCHE guys!”
“Quick! Let's get outta here! Heidegger's in charge of the transport ship.”
“That's tough for both of us.”
“Ride the Shinra ship? Yeah,sounds good I couldn't steer it
“Oh…is that so?”
“Yep! Actually,we do have an old junker we're gonna get rid of, And I was thinking about going into the tourist business.”
“It's a little tougher than it looks I better think this through…”
“Yeah. It's too much for an amateur!”
Shinra Manager “Oh,oh,oh!!! I'm gonna quit this company!!”
“I mean it,I'm really gonna quit!!”
Shinra manager “Heidegger's such an idiot!!”
“And Rufus,acting all big!!”
Shinra manager “God,that sure felt good…”
“The transport ship won't be sailing for quite awhile. Heidegger's orders.”
“Think they're stowaways? You'll be safe pretty soon.”
“It's 100 gil to Junon. Give it to me, and I'll put in a good word with the captain.”
“What'll we do? Pay up Don't do it
“Thank you. Come back any time you want to stowaway on our ship.”
“Hey! No money? And you wanna stowaway? Don't make me laugh!”
“Okay. Come on. This way.”
“It's not the most pleasant ride but make the best of it.”
“After Rufus complimented him, he strutted around awhile, and haven't heard a peep from him since.”
“What a great day for a nap in the sun. It always puts me in a good mood!”
“Hey,who're you?. You look like you've been around the world twice.”
“I don't know what your story is, but hang in there.”
“Everyone's in a rush to get one last vacation in before the Meteor strikes, That's why it's so busy here.”
“There's no ship to Junon. Recently,there's been a hoard on materials. Everything's topsy-turvy.”
“Not gonna be able to nap like this for much longer.”
“When you put it that way,I feel kind of sad.”
“Well,I'm not worried. When it crashes down, I'm heading for the skies.”
“The only problem is… will there be anywhere left to land?”
